Package org.cooperari.core

Cooperari engine.

See: Description

    Interface Description
    CSession.ExecutionHandler
    Exception handler.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ACustomYieldPoint
    Abstract aspect for generic yield points.
    CConfiguration
    Configuration object defined by annotations.
    CCoverageLog
    Coverage log.

    Cooperative execution engine.

    Base class for cooperative operations.
    CRuntime
    Cooperari runtime.
    CSession
    Test session executor.

    Cooperative thread.

    Provides mapping from Thread objects to objects.

    Cooperative execution trace.
    CUncaughtExceptionHandler
    Handler for uncaught thread exceptions.

    Yield point implementation.

    An enumeration of common operation outcomes used by several primitives.

    Cooperative thread state.

    Event types.

    Keeps a record of the Cooperari workspace directory and global configurations, and provides associated utility methods.

    Workspace options.
